attributes.action: help save tales of Robin Hood in nottingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tales of robin hood is to close, but this is a vital tourist attraction to the past of nottingham of the famouse robin hood, if this closes where would people take their children for them to learn the past of their historical city, so all i ask is sign this petitions and maybe we can prevent it from closing.
